title: Woodworking party shop opening in Danbury
title_page: Woodworking party shop opening in Danbury
maintext:
The do-it-yourself woodworking chain Board & Brush Creative Studio has scheduled for the end of May a grand opening of its fifth Connecticut location, at 5 Eagle Road in Danbury opposite Walmart.
Board & Brush offers workshops for people to learn the craft of wooden sign-making or to work on individual projects, also hosting group classes for social events or team-building exercises. Board & Brush has existing Connecticut locations in Norwalk, Monroe, Southington and Mystic.
The Danbury location holds its grand opening on Wednesday, May 29 at 5 p.m., with classes starting the following Friday.
Alex.Soule@scni.com; 203-842-2545; @casoulman
